DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate that the test catheter is no less accepted than the SpeediCath (SC) catheter.
DOC.brief_title: A Randomised, Cross-over, Open-labelled Test Catheter Acceptance Study
DOC.criteria: At least 18 years of age Has normal/impaired sensation in the urethra Selfcatheterises at least 4 times per day Has used clean selfintermittent catheterisation for at least 14 days Is able to open and prepare the catheters for catheterisation Has signed the informed consent before any study relatedactivities. Has a symptomatic urinary tract infection as assessed by the investigator Is mentally unstable as assessed by the investigator
